item.title: A New Platform Is Launching to Protect Public Servants From an Angry Mob
item.description: From data-removal services to threat monitoring, the Public Service Alliance says its new marketplace will help public servants defend themselves in an era of data brokers and political violence.

item.title: Adoption Agency Data Exposure Revealed Information About Children and Parents
item.description: A trove of 1.1 million records left accessible on the open web shows how much sensitive information can be created—and made vulnerable—during the adoption process.

item.title: Adoption Agency Data Exposure Revealed Information About Children and Parents
